description: This is an integer value with range from 0-24. The Epworth Sleepiness Scale assesses the daytime sleepiness of patients. Dr Murray W Johns owns the copyright in the ESS (Copyright Â© M.W.Johns 1990-1997). The official website is http://epworthsleepinessscale.com/. Algorithm: The ESS is computed by adding 8 individual items. If any item is missing then ESS is missing.
